name: Fox Game: Cherry Hunt v.0.01
description:
Fox Game: Cherry Hunt is a 2d platformer where you go on a quest to collect cherries to reach your end goal.  On the way you will encounter dangerous enemies, including exploding frogs and flying eagles. This game also includes an endless runner mode if you get bored of the main game.

Goals:

My goals for this project is a fun platformer consisting of around 10 levels, each increasing in difficulty and a fully working endless runner mode.

Current state (v.0.01):

I have finished one level and have a draft of the endless runner mode. The demo will include these and a WIP of level 2.
